title: DU Fine Arts unit admission test results published
body: Dhaka University on Tuesday published the results of the admission test, covering general knowledge and drawing, for the 2025–26 academic session of its Fine Arts Unit undergraduate programme. The detailed results are available on the university’s admission website. Applicants may also obtain their results by sending an SMS to 16321 from Teletalk, Robi, Airtel or Banglalink numbers in the format: DU FRT, result can be obtained in the return SMS, said a press release issued by the university’s public relations office. Before the publication, dean of the Faculty of Fine Arts and others concerned handed over the result documents to Dhaka University vice-chancellor professor Niaz Ahmed Khan. A total of 6,521 candidates applied against 130 seats this year. Of them, 5,352 sat for the test and 602 passed, with the pass rate standing at 11.25 per cent. The candidates who passed included 145 male and 457 female students. According to the schedule, the admission test of the Arts, Law and Social Sciences Unit will be held on December 13, and the admission test of the Science Unit will be held on December 20. All unit tests will take place from 11:00am to 12:30pm.
